official_title: A bill to designate Mt. Andrea Lawrence.
short_title: Mt. Andrea Lawrence Designation Act of 2010

summary.text: Mt. Andrea Lawrence Designation Act of 2010 - Designates peak 12,240, which is located 0.6 miles northeast of Donahue Peak on the northern border of the Ansel Adams Wilderness and Yosemite National Park in California as Mt. Andrea Lawrence.

titles.title: Mt. Andrea Lawrence Designation Act of 2010
A bill to designate Mt. Andrea Lawrence.
